recipes.title: Garlic Chicken
recipes.instructions: Marinate chicken with garlic and salt. Grill until golden brown.

recipes.title: Tomato Basil Pasta
recipes.description: A fresh tomato and basil pasta.
recipes.instructions: Boil pasta. Sauté tomatoes and basil. Mix together and serve.

recipes.title: Beef Stew
recipes.description: A hearty beef stew with carrots and potatoes.
recipes.instructions: Brown beef. Add carrots, potatoes, and simmer until tender.

recipes.title: Carrot Soup
recipes.description: A creamy carrot soup with onion and garlic.
recipes.instructions: Sauté onions and garlic. Add carrots and blend with water.

recipes.title: Basil Chicken Stir-fry
recipes.description: A quick stir-fried chicken dish with basil and garlic.
recipes.instructions: Stir-fry chicken with garlic and basil. Serve hot.

recipes.title: Potato Wedges
recipes.description: Crispy oven-baked potato wedges with salt and pepper.
recipes.instructions: Cut potatoes into wedges. Bake with salt and pepper until crisp.

recipes.title: Tomato Soup
recipes.description: A rich tomato soup flavored with basil and garlic.
recipes.instructions: Blend tomatoes with basil and garlic. Simmer and serve.

recipes.title: Garlic Roasted Beef
recipes.description: Juicy beef roast seasoned with garlic and pepper.
recipes.instructions: Season beef with garlic and pepper. Roast until done.

recipes.title: Onion Stir-fry
recipes.description: A simple onion stir-fry with garlic and salt.
recipes.instructions: Sauté onions with garlic and salt until caramelized.

recipes.title: Spicy Chicken Soup
recipes.description: A spicy chicken soup with tomato and pepper.
recipes.instructions: Boil chicken with tomato and pepper. Serve hot.
